metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14763 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 4.16.4, a double-locking error indrivers/usb/dwc3/gadget.c may potentially cause a deadlock with f_hid.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-60.67
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.0.0-23-generic - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
linux-image-5.0.0-23-generic-lpae - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
linux-image-5.0.0-23-lowlatency - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-23-generic - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-23-lowlatency - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1056-oem - 4.15.0-1056.65
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

No subscription required

No subscription required

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-60.67').
